BigWigs_Voice.Title: BigWigs_Voice_VoxPack
BigWigs_Voice.Notes: A plugin for BigWigs that will play Text-To-Speech sounds for boss abilities.

AdditionalNotes.zhCN: BigWigs附加模块，为团队首领技能播放语音合成（TTS）提示。
AdditionalNotes.zhTW: BigWigs附加模組，為團隊首領技能播放語音合成（TTS）提示。

BigWigs_Countdown.Title: BigWigs_Countdown_VoxPack
BigWigs_Countdown.Notes: A BigWigs plugin that adds a new countdown voice pack.
